creator: w.riezebos@genimen.com
text:
Running tests with JMeter; (using less than 100% CPU on JMeter machine)
the reported response times are significantly faster if both using the graph 
results AND aggregate report listeners are active. Strangely enough the same 
test, run under the same conditions with the Graph results DISABLED reports 
longer response times (was 200 ms; went up to 2000 ms!?)
This is even the case when distributing the load over three remote JMeter 
servers; with the client just listening.

creator: mstover1@apache.org
text:
I couldn't recreate this with the latest code.  I'll assume it's fixed until
further notice.
